scripts.db:core: npx wrangler d1 execute monopolyd1 --file db/schema/core.sql
scripts.db:ui: npx wrangler d1 execute monopolyui --file db/schema/ui.sql

scripts.db:setup: npm run db:core && npm run db:ui && npm run db:app
scripts.rdb:core: npx wrangler d1 execute monopolyd1 --remote --file db/schema/core.sql
scripts.rdb:ui: npx wrangler d1 execute monopolyui --remote --file db/schema/ui.sql
scripts.rdb:app: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --remote --file db/schema/app.sql
scripts.rdb:setup: npm run rdb:core && npm run rdb:ui && npm run rdb:app

scripts.rdb:reset:ui: npx wrangler d1 execute monopolyui --remote --file db/schema/drop-ui.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute monopolyui --remote --file db/schema/ui.sql
scripts.rdb:reset:app: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --remote --file db/schema/drop-app.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute DB --remote --file db/schema/app.sql
scripts.rdb:reset: npm run rdb:reset:core && npm run rdb:reset:ui && npm run rdb:reset:app
